Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Jorge Venezuela
Reviews.Content: Compre este celular para usar en Venezuela funciono super bien, muy contento con el equipo. El paquete llego con todos sus accesorios y manuales, nada chino pq una vez me llego un bb con los manuales en Chino y no sabia si era una replica o si en realidad era original.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Labarca
Reviews.Content: It's a really good phone, faster and very nice. Just one something is wrong with this phone "is not 3G", BB OS 7.1 is awesome. I really like this Phone.

Reviews.Title: Puro engaño del proveedor
Reviews.Author: Morelis Serrano "MOR3VZLA"
Reviews.Content: no cuenta con la bandas que describe el proveedor... no lo pude usar con mi operador Movistar..  la descripcion que da el proveedor es falsa,,, no es quatribanda y el precio no va con la descripcion

Reviews.Title: just a question...
Reviews.Author: carl
Reviews.Content: I'm just wondering, will this phone also work if used outside U.S.? It was mentioned that this phone is unlocked... so can I use sim cards sold outside U.S.?

Reviews.Title: I'm a bit disappointed
Reviews.Author: Bobbie A. B.
Reviews.Content: I don't know if any of you guys experienced this but my unit heats a lot and very slow to process. It might be a battery problem and whenever this happens my unit automatically restarts. I'm pissed off and I wanted to return this phone but I couldn't. I searched over the internet to find some fix and I tried this out type in LGLG while holding down the alt key and select clear logs this will keep your unit a little fast.You may also want to consider getting this on a plan with BIS because you can't use other apps without it like gtalk, twitter, etc. but you can use fb and youtube via wifi. Well, overall I rated this 3 Stars because it really didn't impress me. I would not recommend this if you want a fast phone.

Reviews.Title: Not fully unlocked :-( + NO GPS
Reviews.Author: Alexey R. Olkov "traveller"
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine. And it's quite handy.However, it is quite annoying to see the TELCEL (Mexican Phone Provider) logo on startup. In addition, there is no option to setup a personal email account - only enterprise, which means I can't normally check my email.My provider's customer support said the phone is probably not "fully unlocked". Because of this, I am also unable to register for the BlackBerry Service account.The phone is very nice though, battery works great. But it's quite ridiculous that I can check email on an ancient flip-phone and not on bberry. Feel somewhat duped.Also, no GPS (it's not really promised in the product description, but for some reason blackberry.com says this model does have it.)

Reviews.Title: The 5 stars are due to its low price/funcionability.
Reviews.Author: Ortodontic
Reviews.Content: I was a BB user, then went iPhone 'n' Galaxy III, now Iam back blackberry's world. Its low price n easy to use mame it my perfect tool. I will use iPad n iPhone x sure, but for every day work...this one!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Fay
Reviews.Content: Phone is working fine so far.  Only issue is that the existing memory card is not registering in the phone to be able to access saved photos.

Reviews.Title: "connect with BBM,are you kidding me?!"
Reviews.Author: asdfgh
Reviews.Content: I ordered 9220,and I was trying to activate my BBM,but I can't. So Icalled Blackberry Customer support,and told me,that the "pin" that I have does not exist! The rep asked me if it has warranty,and it doesn't. So the rep was somehow telling me it's not legit enough. I'm returning it for a full refund,and get the same phone with warranty. Goodluck for me!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9220 Curve Unlocked GSM Smartphone
Reviews.Author: David Payne
Reviews.Content: I bought this Blackberry 9220 Curve Smarsphone and shipped it overseas to my son as a gift. He said its a good phone, but wished it had a flash camera.I therefore, recomend this Blackberry Curve to anyone who is looking for a good inexpensive  Smartphone without a flash camera.

Reviews.Title: On time---but the box looked like it was a used item
Reviews.Author: ND
Reviews.Content: Taking this blackberry to Italy to my niece. I read the reviews and hope she will get what she is hoping forI was very happy I got this item as promised, two days delivery, and it was.I was pretty suspicious about the box, it looked like it was used, so I questioned the fact that it may have been a used phone.I looked for scratches and did not see any but the phone does not look brand new either...yet to be seeing its performance..

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: MARBENY VERUSKA GARCIA SILVA
Reviews.Content: excellent! the phone is promised! worked perfect, this new, works seamlessly with Movilnet ... muuuuuy bueno, me encanto este blackberry!!

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: great product! but I wish it came in other colours. and I will like it had come with micro sd card.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Yeffreson
Reviews.Content: Adquiri el equipo confiando y no me equivoque, buen equipo hasta los momentos funcionando perfectamente, vino con todos sus accesorios en buen estado, sin ningun detalle negativo, vendedor recomendado de Venezuela

Reviews.Title: My friend loves it
Reviews.Author: diego
Reviews.Content: The device was for a friend, met his expectations which were a good battery lasting device, easy to use, relatively cheap and with a trusty OS.He didn't care about the camera or screen quality so we don't count those.

Reviews.Title: Apparently they are well
Reviews.Author: Milemnys R. Guerra "Milemnys R."
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 blackberry curve 9220 without problem received them only bad thing is that the boxes in which they come are old and battered as plastics are scratched phones do not understand the reason for this seems to be that the boxes were heavily manipulated ..But the phones are good for the operation of them.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Mario A. Torres
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone for texting, emailing and keeping in touch with your fellas. It's not fancy at all, but I will last in the easy way 2 to 3 years.

Reviews.Title: excelent product
Reviews.Author: jimmy noirega
Reviews.Content: produto excellent works everything perfectly thank you very much product received great attention with all accessories thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Una excelente compra
Reviews.Author: Karlie Ortega
Reviews.Content: Compre 2 celulares, porque me parecio muy buen precio. El envio fue estupendo, llego a tiempo y en buen estado sin problema alguno.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: BrandonB
Reviews.Content: Good product, just as agreed, the delivery date was agreed, I'm from Venezuela and I paqueta arrived in good condition, without any defect, except that the magazine brought me the phone does not work in my country (the electrical plug ) but I could fix that had a blackberry before ... Very good.

Reviews.Title: bad bussiness
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: This phone no works in 3 g.am unhappy bad bussinesEl negocio no eraá lo prometido en el aviso de ventaLos equipos no funcionan en 3g en ninguna operador

Reviews.Title: Equipo defectuoso
Reviews.Author: Antonio Gallardo
Reviews.Content: El equipo no duro ni un mes funcionando bien. En mi caso presenta falla al reproducir multimedia o cuando se realiza una llamada.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Angel Tenias
Reviews.Content: excelente producto , tiempo exacto de llegada y totalmente nuevo y excelente precio. reomendado totalmente vendedor muy serio . .

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE  TELEFONO
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos López
Reviews.Content: valio la pena esperar el tefofono mes y medio, Liberty express tiene retrasos fuertes en venezuela. Era lo esperado, el telefono funciona perfectamente con Digitel, super rapido a pesar de ser 2G, lo recomiendo. trajo todos sus accesorios completos (manual,audifonos,manos libres, y cargador)

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: lorena
Reviews.Content: llego en excelente condiciones y al el tiempo requerido a mi hijo le encanto, esta en excelente condiciones y a tiempo funciona perfectamente con movistar en venezuela

Reviews.Title: NO ERA LO ESPERADO
Reviews.Author: marlene low
Reviews.Content: EL CELULAR TIENE POCA SEÑAL, LA ENTREGA FUE EXCELENTE Y PUNTUALES  EN EL TIEMPO. TENGO POCO TIEMPO DE USO .

Reviews.Title: IMPECABLE
Reviews.Author: Johnny Gomez "JG"
Reviews.Content: LA COMPRA FUE RAPIDA, LOS PAQUETES FUERON ENTREGADOS TAL Y COMO SE ACORDO, EN LAS FECHAS PREVISTAS, LOS TLF SON TOTALMENTE NUEVOS, SIN PROBLEMAS

Reviews.Title: Excelente empaque.
Reviews.Author: A. Alcala "The knower"
Reviews.Content: Lo mejor por mi dinero. Muy agradecido. Mas en Venezuela que los BB están por las nubes aunque estos no tendrán mayores actualizaciones.

Reviews.Title: reclamo
Reviews.Author: alberto braz
Reviews.Content: hola veo con preocupacion que que los celulares llegan sin audifono o auricularhello I note with concern that the phones come without headset or handset

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Josue
Reviews.Content: funciona todo a la perfeccion.. nada anormal.. todo fino... las aplicaciones, el sistema, los auriculares,la camara excelente. en perfectas condiciones.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: luis eduardo hernandez ochoa
Reviews.Content: ok people responsible arrive on time and in perfectc ondition  the product works great and my wife is very happy with his dremmel

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM/GPRS/EDGE: 850/900/1800/1900 GSM/GPRS networks; Memory: 512 MB ROM, 512 MB RAM; Card Slot: microSD, up to 32 GB; BlackBerry OS 7.1
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP, Stereo FM radio with RDS, MP3/eAAC+/WMA/WAV/FLAC player
Camera: 2 MP, 1600x1200 pixels, Video recording, 5X digital zoom; 35-key, backlit, narrow QWERTY keyboard with Optical trackpad
1450 mAh removable/rechargeable lithium-ion battery (J-S1) - Talk time: up to 7 hours; Standby time: up to 18 days
Big and bright screen display: QVGA 320x240 resolution, 164 ppi, Transmissive TFT LCD, 2.44-Inch (measured diagonally)
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry 9220 Curve Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Smartphone with Wi-Fi, 2MP Camera and 7.1 Blackberry OS International Version/Warranty - Black
